item.title: Getting Annoying! Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Ptolemy_Alch Ptolemy Alch
item.description:
@Ptolemy_Alch wrote:

 if(playerRights >= 0) {
		   sendMessage("Welcome To AlchemyScape");
                                      sendMessage("Type ::commands For Commands");
                                      sendMessage("Thieve For Money");
                                     
                                      sendMessage("_______________");
		  }
                 if(playerRights >= 1) {
                                     sendMessage("Welcome Back Moderator "+playerName);
                                     sendMessage("Type ::banuser name (To Ban The *Account* From Server.");
                 }
                 if(playerRights >= 2) {
                                     sendMessage("Welcome Back Administrator "+playerName);
                                     sendMessage("You Just Totally Own!");
                 }

I want it to only say the Modertor stuff…when a mod comes on ect…but everytime i log on everything appears. [br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2007, 04:12:15 PM[/size][hr]someone?
